name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vivid Notion - Use custom colors for text in Notion

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your text in Notion with personalized colors! Simply input your text, select your desired font, and pick a color usingâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your text in Notion with personalized colors! Simply input your text, select your desired font, and pick a color using our intuitive color picker. Our extension will then generate the corresponding KaTeX code for you to easily copy and paste into your Notion page.
